input.sentences: these are some amazing photos from our wedding day in the chapel !
me and my lovely husband walking down the aisle here .
him feeding me the cake before we dance .
and we danced the night away hor hours .

output.sentences: What a great day for a wedding.
The bride and groom were so happy as they turned to walk down the aisle.
Don't shove that cake in her face, Mister Mister!
Thanks, Papa, for dancing with me.
